quote: Sometimes I think the loneliness inside of me is going to explode through my skin and sometimes im not sure if crying or screaming or laughing through the hysteria will solve anything at all
quote_letters: SOMETIMES I THINK THE LONELINESS INSIDE OF ME IS GOING TO EXPLODE THROUGH MY SKIN AND SOMETIMES IM NOT SURE IF CRYING OR SCREAMING OR LAUGHING THROUGH THE HYSTERIA WILL SOLVE ANYTHING AT ALL
